reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: NAPTIP-Training and exchange of information, visit of Nigerian experts to Finland

description.narrative: NAPTIP (National Agency for the Prohibition of Traffic in Persons and Other Related Matters) organizes a training visit to Finland for Nigerian experts. Finnish Boarder Guards together with other Finnish authorities is in charge of the program in Finland. The objective of the visit is training information exchange and establishing contacts between Nigerian and Finnish authorities. The visit is based on the good experiences of the visit of Finnish experts to Nigeria in the autumn 2012. Six Nigerian experts w ill participate in the program. The duration of the visit will be two weeks.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland
